mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYGROUP (GID, GCHARACTER, MID, GTITLE, GCONTENT, GPEOPLE, GCURPEOPLE, GLANGUAGE1, GLANGUAGE2, GLANGUAGE3, GDEV, GDESIGN, GPM, GSDATE, GFDATE, GLOC) VALUES(MYGROUP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gcharacter}, #{mid},#{gtitle},#{gcontent}, #{gpeople}, 1, #{glanguage1},#{glanguage2},#{glanguage3}, #{gdev}, #{gdesign}, #{gpm}, #{gsdate}, #{gfdate}, #{gloc})
